```{python 'Y-Loaded-Modules', decorate=TRUE}
# Imported (Basic) Modules in Python 
allmodules = [v.__name__ for k, v in globals().items() 
    if type(v) is types.ModuleType and not k.startswith('__')]

len(allmodules)

", ".join(allmodules)

```
